front.title: Deprecation of the use of BGP AS_SET, AS_CONFED_SET.

abstract.t: This document deprecates the use of the AS_SET and AS_CONFED_SET types of the AS_PATH in BGPv4. This is done to simplify the design and implementation of the BGP protocol and to make the semantics of the originator of a route more clear. This will also simplify the design, implementation and deployment of ongoing work in the Secure Inter-Domain Routing Working Group.
